results.name: The Workplace Proximity
results.overview: Amy starts working at Caltech which causes friction with Sheldon. Howard agrees with Sheldon who mentions this to Bernadette causing a big fight for the Wolowitzes.

results.name: Big Man in Tehran
results.overview: Brody's loyalty to the mission wavers when he meets a ghost from his past. As Lockhart's confirmation looms, Saul stares into the precipice between success and failure.

results.name: Dramatics, Your Honor
results.overview: Alicia asks Cary to be her lawyer when Nelson Dubeck (Eric Bogosian) asks her to participate in a deposition; Will faces off with a new prosecutor while defending Jeffrey Grant (Hunter Parrish).

results.name: The Laws of Gods and Men
results.overview: Stannis and Davos set sail; Dany meets with supplicants; Tyrion faces down his father.

results.name: Mockingbird
results.overview: Tyrion gains an unlikely ally; Daario asks Dany to allow him to do what he does best; Jon's warnings about the vulnerability of the Wall are ignored; Brienne follows a new lead.

results.name: Tome-wan
results.overview: Bedelia returns and accepts immunity to testify against Hannibal. Mason Verger plots revenge after learning of Hannibal's manipulations.

results.name: Mizumono
results.overview: Springing their trap, Jack, Will and Alana face off with Hannibal in a bloody final showdown, but the doctor has a few surprises of his own.

results.name: The Mountain and the Viper
results.overview: Unexpected visitors arrive in Mole's Town. Littlefinger's motives are questioned. Ramsay tries to prove himself to his father. Tyrion's fate is decided.

results.name: Felina
results.overview: All bad things must come to an end.

results.name: Night Zero
results.overview: When a plane lands in New York City with everyone on board dead, Dr. Ephraim Goodweather, head of the CDC’s Canary Project, and his team are called upon to investigate. Harlem pawnbroker Abraham Setrakian races to the airport, convinced that what looks at first like a mysterious viral outbreak might be the beginning of something infinitely more sinister.

results.name: Running with the Bull
results.overview: Daniel’s family fears he won’t recover from his injuries and his attackers will escape justice. Judy Dean shows Bobby some unexpected affection. Ted, Jr. hides a shameful secret from his wife. Sheriff Daggett investigates Daniel’s beating.

results.name: The Garveys at Their Best
results.overview: Kevin tries to suppress his bad habits while tracking down a marauding deer in Mapleton. Laurie receives not-unexpected news amidst a rising sense of foreboding. Tom connects with his past, against his better judgment. Nora has a job interview; Kevin Senior receives an honor.

results.name: Live Free or Die
results.overview: As Walt deals with the aftermath of the Casa Tranquila explosion, Hank works to wrap up his investigation of Gus' empire.

results.name: Say My Name
results.overview: Walt takes control of business matters; Mike deals with the consequences of his actions.

results.name: The Battle Creek Way
results.overview: Jaded Det. Russ Agnew reluctantly partners with charming FBI Agent Milt Chamberlain to solve a drug-related double homicide, but while Milt investigates with the high-tech resources of the FBI, Russ prefers old-school police work and instinct.

results.name: The Wrong Stuff
results.overview: When an astronaut, training for a trip to Mars, is mysteriously killed inside a Mars simulation, Castle and Beckett don spacesuits to investigate. But when they discover no one inside the sealed simulation could have committed the murder and no one from the outside could get in, the case takes a shocking turn

results.name: Daredevil
results.overview: In the season finale, a boxed-in Fisk and a desperate Murdock, Foggy and Karen are forced to play their end games.

results.name: Part 1
results.overview: Trouble starts when oldest son Danny Rayburn comes home for the 45th anniversary celebration of his parents' hotel in the Florida Keys' Islamorada.

results.name: Hardhome
results.overview: Arya makes progress in her training. Sansa confronts an old friend. Cersei struggles. Jon travels.

results.name: Winter Is Coming
results.overview: Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King, is dead. King Robert Baratheon plans to ask his oldest friend, Eddard Stark, to take Jon's place. Across the sea, Viserys Targaryen plans to wed his sister to a nomadic warlord in exchange for an army.
